entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:06 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -40.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -40.7°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -44.7°C
Wind: NNE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 57 this morning and minus 49 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 40.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 40. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
